languages.text: "Да, Ваша Светлость. Вы — {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}ценный деловой партнер{/d}, хотя я бы и желал вывести наши торговые отношения на более доверительный уровень. Когда вернетесь с трофеями из похода, помните, что я готов предложить лучшую цену".

"Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You're a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}valuable business partner{/d}, although I'd much like to take our trade relationship to a higher level of trust. When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember that I can offer the best price."
languages.original_text: "Да, Ваша Светлость. Вы — {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}ценный деловой партнер{/d}, хотя я бы и желал вывести наши торговые отношения на более доверительный уровень. Когда вернетесь с трофеями из похода, помните, что я готов предложить лучшую цену".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You're a valuable business partner, although I'd much like to take our trade relationship to a higher level of trust. When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember I can offer the best price."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember that I can offer the best price."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “是的，大人。您是位{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}非常有价值的商业伙伴{/d}，不过，我更希望我们之间的合作关系能变得更加密切，更加彼此信任。当您带着战利品从远征中顺利归来时，请记住，我可以为您提供最优惠的价格。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You're a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}valuable business partner{/d}, although I'd much like to take our trade relationship to a higher level of trust. When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember that I can offer the best price."

traits.locale_text: “是的，大人。您是位非常有价值的商业伙伴，不过，我更希望我们之间的合作关系能变得更加密切，更加彼此信任。当您带着战利品从远征中顺利归来时，请记住，我可以为您提供最优惠的价格。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「はい、陛下。あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}貴重なビジネスパートナー{/d}です。是非とも私達の商売関係を強めたいと思っています。あなたがトロフィーを持って遠征から帰ってきた際には、最良の価格を提供いたしますので、どうぞ覚えておいてください」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You're a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}valuable business partner{/d}, although I'd much like to take our trade relationship to a higher level of trust. When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember that I can offer the best price."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、陛下。あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}貴重なビジネスパートナー{/d}です。是非とも私達の商売関係を強めたいと思っています。あなたがトロフィーを持って遠征から帰ってきた際には、最良の価格を提供いたしますので、どうぞ覚えておいてください」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Es usted {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}{mf|un|una} soci{mf|o|a} valios{mf|o|a}{/d}, aunque me gustaría aumentar la confianza con respecto a nuestra relación comercial. Cuando vuelva de su expedición, recuerde que puedo ofrecerle los mejores precios».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You're a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}valuable business partner{/d}, although I'd much like to take our trade relationship to a higher level of trust. When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember that I can offer the best price."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Es usted {mf|un|una} valios{mf|o|a} soci{mf|o|a}, aunque me gustaría aumentar la confianza con respecto a nuestra relación comercial. Cuando vuelva de su expedición, recuerde que puedo ofrecerle los mejores precios».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ja, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr seid {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}{mf|ein wertvoller Geschäftspartner|eine wertvolle Geschäftspartnerin}{/d}, auch wenn ich unsere Handelsbeziehung gerne auf eine noch größere Vertrauensbasis stellen würde. Wenn Ihr mit Trophäen von Eurer Expedition zurückkehrt, denkt daran, dass ich Euch den besten Preis anbieten kann."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You're a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}valuable business partner{/d}, although I'd much like to take our trade relationship to a higher level of trust. When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember that I can offer the best price."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr seid {mf|ein wertvoller Geschäftspartner|eine wertvolle Geschäftspartnerin}, auch wenn ich unsere Handelsbeziehung gerne auf eine noch größere Vertrauensbasis stellen würde. Wenn Ihr mit Trophäen von Eurer Expedition zurückkehrt, denkt daran, dass ich Euch den besten Preis anbieten kann."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Oui, Votre Seigneurie. Vous êtes {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}{mf|un précieux associé|une précieuse associée}{/d}, même si je regrette que votre confiance en nous soit si limitée. Quand vous reviendrez de votre expédition, n'oubliez pas de vous adresser à moi pour la vente de vos trophées. Je vous garantis de vous proposer les meilleurs prix. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You're a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}valuable business partner{/d}, although I'd much like to take our trade relationship to a higher level of trust. When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember that I can offer the best price."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, Votre Seigneurie. Vous êtes {mf|un précieux associé|une précieuse associée}, même si je regrette que votre confiance en nous soit si limitée. Quand vous reviendrez de votre expédition, n'oubliez pas de vous adresser à moi pour la vente de vos trophées. Je vous garantis de vous proposer les meilleurs prix. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Evet {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Çok {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}değerli bir iş ortağımızsınız{/d} ancak bu ticaret ilişkisini daha üst düzeyde bir güven ilişkisine dönüştürmek isterim. Keşif seferinizden ganimetler eşliğinde döndüğünüzde en iyi fiyatları benim verebileceğimi bilin."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You're a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}valuable business partner{/d}, although I'd much like to take our trade relationship to a higher level of trust. When you're back from your expedition with trophies, remember that I can offer the best price."

traits.locale_text: "Evet {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Çok {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}değerli bir iş ortağımızsınız{/d} ancak bu ticaret ilişkisini daha üst düzeyde bir güven ilişkisine dönüştürmek isterim. Keşif seferinizden ganimetler eşliğinde döndüğünüzde, en iyi fiyatları benim verebileceğimi bilin."
